original_title: Doll+: Body Transmigration in its Ideal Fantasy
overview: Plastic dolls dance in the sky to a pop song. In a posthuman world, the perfect body is made of orange-yellow plastic in a factory in China. This figure without gender exists in a virtual space where illness, death and aesthetics are only absurd concepts. In 3-D animations, the film ponders on capitalism, virtuality and the human body.
title: Doll+: Body Transmigration in its Ideal Fantasy
